name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Why do bad things happen to mediocre people?

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Why do bad things happen to mediocre people?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why do bad things happen to mediocre people?

A question I ask myself every day. 

A question my friend Elin asks herself every day. 

Now you can ask yourself, too.

Alongside a beautiful Unsplash image.

Because you're worth it. And because you're mediocre.
